0.0.2.name: wordpress/junaid-bhura-switch-blog-theme
0.0.2.description:
With this plugin you can set a base name for your blog pages. For example: http://www.yoursite.com/blog/name-of-my-post , where "blog" is the base for your blog pages. If the plugin detects the base name in the URL, it switches the theme to a completely different theme which you can select.

Similarly, in the WP Admin, while adding a new post, the theme is switched to the blog theme and it shows the blog theme's options instead of the default theme's options.

Read the installation instructions carefully before using!
